Definition.WordDefinition: curvy adj 1: having curves; "a settee with only one curvy end" [syn: {curvey}] 2: (of a woman's body) having a large bosom and pleasing curves; "Hollywood seems full of curvaceous blondes"; "a curvy young woman in a tight dress" [syn: {bosomy}, {busty}, {buxom}, {curvaceous}, {full-bosomed}, {sonsie}, {sonsy}, {voluptuous}, {well-endowed}]
